name: places/ChIJD7SMx71YwokRQp_0VwmON5s
formattedAddress: 1220 Lexington Ave # 2B, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1220 Lexington Ave # 2B, New York, NY 10028-1456, USA

originalText.text:
Came highly recommended, but now they're dialing it in. It's clear they charge top dollar for "baby nurses" but in actuality there is very little vetting, training, or quality control. Approach with caution and double check everything. We found the nurse we were assigned potentially didn't have the right credentials, slow walked sharing information on things that were *her* expertise which raises questions on credentialing and actual experience. When raised with the agency, was met with tepid response.

Avoid until they show there is actual training and quality control.

originalText.text: The Frances Stewart Agency is wonderful! My husband and I had our first son in May 2023. The team at Frances Stewart was kind, incredibly responsive, proactive, and made us feel extremely comfortable in preparation for homecoming. The nurse that Frances Stewart sent -- Iolene Fray -- is AMAZING!!! She was a calming presence, an encouraging teacher, and an all around amazing human being. We love her!!! When I was pregnant, I was not convinced I needed a baby nurse for my son. When my husband and friends encouraged me to look into it further, I decided to try it based on their feedback and after speaking with Vanessa at Frances Steward. I am so glad I did. I highly recommend Frances Stewart Agency if you are looking for a baby nurse!!

I highly recommend Frances Stewart Agency if you are looking for a baby nurse!!

originalText.text:
Highly recommended, as a first time mom with NICU baby here — from the first phone call, I was met with incredible professionalism by Noah who was thoughtful, listed to our needs & asks on shorter notice (NICU stay was a curve ball for our family).  The agency sent us a saint of a night nurse, Natalie — we connected well, our daughter was always calm in her arms and I appreciated her warmth & diligence.  Always on point when it came to our daughter’s feeds (never heard her cry), but also how generous she was with us, sharing insights, especially welcome as a first time parent.

It can be nerve-wracking to bring someone into your home, and be with your child — but I’m grateful we went forward and I was able to have much needed rest post-delivery & most importantly, know our baby girl was in great care.

originalText.text:
Our baby nurse, Nicola, was truly amazing! She was exceptionally helpful, honest, kind, and generous. We could not have been happier with our experience with her and hope that our paths cross again soon.

In general, our experience with Frances Stewart was perfect and we are very happy we went to them - the whole team was warm, approachable, and flexible.

Thank you again!

originalText.text: When we asked our friends and colleagues for recommendations in finding a night nurse, Frances Stewart came up repeatedly, and they did not let us down. The company was fantastic throughout the whole process - they were thorough, communicative, trustworthy, and caring. Our night nurse was absolutely incredible - so knowledgeable, sweet, loving, and professional. We learned so much from her and genuinely enjoyed being around her. She helped so much in reducing the normal new parent jitters. We would recommend this agency to anyone who asked!
